resources.string:
Newzz provides news from the leading news channels all around the world.
Newzz provides all the relevant informations in a precise manner.
Newzz provide data on basis of country,categories,trending.


Categores include:

 *business
 *general
 *health
 *science
 *sports
 *technology
 *entertainment


Newzz FEATURES

 *Opt categories u r interested in
 *Filter on basis of categories
 *get notified on Breaking News
 *photos of events, celebrities and 
 happenings from around the world
 *Share news over social media
 *Read news offline
 *Customized profile
 *Search articles 
 *Mark channels as favourite
